Animar, Soul of Elements.name: Animar, Soul of Elements
Animar, Soul of Elements.text:
Protection from white and from black
Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Animar, Soul of Elements.
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Animar.

Llanowar Elves.name: Llanowar Elves
Llanowar Elves.flavor:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

Elvish Mystic.name: Elvish Mystic
Elvish Mystic.flavor:
"Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest."
—Nissa Revane

Terra Stomper.name: Terra Stomper
Terra Stomper.text:
Terra Stomper can't be countered.
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Terra Stomper.flavor: Its footfalls cause violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms.

Feral Hydra.name: Feral Hydra
Feral Hydra.text:
Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Feral Hydra. Any player may activate this ability.
Feral Hydra.flavor: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.

Curse of Stalked Prey.name: Curse of Stalked Prey
Curse of Stalked Prey.text:
Enchant player
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Curse of Stalked Prey.flavor:
"Innocent thorns can fill the air with your bloodscent. Don't stray from the path."
—Elmut, crossway watcher

Hinterland Harbor.name: Hinterland Harbor
Hinterland Harbor.text:
Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
Hinterland Harbor.flavor: In places where the sea meets the trees, it's easy to forget the darkness that rules most of Innistrad.

Deadeye Navigator.name: Deadeye Navigator
Deadeye Navigator.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

Champion of Lambholt.name: Champion of Lambholt
Champion of Lambholt.text:
Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

Druids' Repository.name: Druids' Repository
Druids' Repository.text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a charge counter on Druids' Repository.
Remove a charge counter from Druids' Repository: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

Soul of the Harvest.name: Soul of the Harvest
Soul of the Harvest.text:
Trample
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
Soul of the Harvest.flavor: It's there when a seed sprouts, when gourds ripen on the vines, and when the reapers cut the grains under the Harvest Moon.

Simic Manipulator.name: Simic Manipulator
Simic Manipulator.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

Crocanura.name: Crocanura
Crocanura.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Forced Adaptation.name: Forced Adaptation
Forced Adaptation.text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
Forced Adaptation.flavor:
"We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

Gyre Sage.name: Gyre Sage
Gyre Sage.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

Skarrg Goliath.name: Skarrg Goliath
Skarrg Goliath.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.
Skarrg Goliath.flavor:
"They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

Borborygmos Enraged.name: Borborygmos Enraged
Borborygmos Enraged.text:
Trample
Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

Fathom Mage.name: Fathom Mage
Fathom Mage.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

Ghor-Clan Rampager.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
Ghor-Clan Rampager.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
Ghor-Clan Rampager.flavor:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

Gruul Ragebeast.name: Gruul Ragebeast
Gruul Ragebeast.text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.
Gruul Ragebeast.flavor:
"If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

Mystic Genesis.name: Mystic Genesis
Mystic Genesis.text: Counter target spell. Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
Mystic Genesis.flavor:
"The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

Nimbus Swimmer.name: Nimbus Swimmer
Nimbus Swimmer.text:
Flying
Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Nimbus Swimmer.flavor: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

Prime Speaker Zegana.name: Prime Speaker Zegana
Prime Speaker Zegana.text:
Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control.
When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

Rubblehulk.name: Rubblehulk
Rubblehulk.text:
Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

Shambleshark.name: Shambleshark
Shambleshark.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Signal the Clans.name: Signal the Clans
Signal the Clans.text: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.
Signal the Clans.flavor: Gruul clanfolk obey few rules, but all feel bound to answer the call of the horn.

Skarrg Guildmage.name: Skarrg Guildmage
Skarrg Guildmage.text:
{R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

Unexpected Results.name: Unexpected Results
Unexpected Results.text: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

Urban Evolution.name: Urban Evolution
Urban Evolution.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
Urban Evolution.flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

Zameck Guildmage.name: Zameck Guildmage
Zameck Guildmage.text:
{G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

Burning-Tree Emissary.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
Burning-Tree Emissary.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.
Burning-Tree Emissary.flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

Rubblebelt Raiders.name: Rubblebelt Raiders
Rubblebelt Raiders.text: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.
Rubblebelt Raiders.flavor:
"This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

Breeding Pool.name: Breeding Pool
Breeding Pool.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.)
As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.
Breeding Pool.flavor: Uncharted depths. Unbounded hopes. Unfathomable mysteries.

Gruul Guildgate.name: Gruul Guildgate
Gruul Guildgate.text:
Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
Gruul Guildgate.flavor: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

Simic Guildgate.name: Simic Guildgate
Simic Guildgate.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
Simic Guildgate.flavor: Enter and comprehend the perfection of orchestrated life.

Stomping Ground.name: Stomping Ground
Stomping Ground.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.)
As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Stomping Ground enters the battlefield tapped.
Stomping Ground.flavor:
"Roots, ruins, and room to fight. All the comforts of home."
—Domri Rade

Battering Krasis.name: Battering Krasis
Battering Krasis.text:
Trample
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Renegade Krasis.name: Renegade Krasis
Renegade Krasis.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever Renegade Krasis evolves, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Bred for the Hunt.name: Bred for the Hunt
Bred for the Hunt.text: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
Bred for the Hunt.flavor: Some see the world as a place of infinite wonder and knowledge. Some see it as an infinite dinner plate.

Plasm Capture.name: Plasm Capture
Plasm Capture.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
Plasm Capture.flavor:
"Everything serves a purpose. Even you."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

Savageborn Hydra.name: Savageborn Hydra
Savageborn Hydra.text:
Double strike
Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

Vorel of the Hull Clade.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
Vorel of the Hull Clade.text: {G}{U}, {T}: For each counter on target artifact, creature, or land, put another of those counters on that permanent.
Vorel of the Hull Clade.flavor: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

Zhur-Taa Ancient.name: Zhur-Taa Ancient
Zhur-Taa Ancient.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.
Zhur-Taa Ancient.flavor: Many Ravnicans think of nature as orderly groves and elf-tended rot farms. They haven't seen the Gruul wilds.

Izzet Guildgate.name: Izzet Guildgate
Izzet Guildgate.text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.
Izzet Guildgate.flavor: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.

Prophet of Kruphix.name: Prophet of Kruphix
Prophet of Kruphix.text:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature cards as though they had flash.
Prophet of Kruphix.flavor: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."

Kiora, the Crashing Wave.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave
Kiora, the Crashing Wave.text:
+1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.
−1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn.
−5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, put a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token onto the battlefield."

Kiora's Follower.name: Kiora's Follower
Kiora's Follower.flavor: "She may call herself Kiora but I believe she is Thassa, the embodiment of the sea and empress of the depths."

Golden Hind.name: Golden Hind
Golden Hind.flavor:
"It is not yours to hunt, mortal. Be content with its beauty alone."
—Nylea, god of the hunt

Heroes' Bane.name: Heroes' Bane
Heroes' Bane.text:
Heroes' Bane enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Heroes' Bane, where X is its power.
Heroes' Bane.flavor: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

Fleetfeather Cockatrice.name: Fleetfeather Cockatrice
Fleetfeather Cockatrice.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying, deathtouch
{5}{G}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

Lorescale Coatl.name: Lorescale Coatl
Lorescale Coatl.text: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.
Lorescale Coatl.flavor:
"The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales."
—Ranalus, vedalken heretic

Simic Sky Swallower.name: Simic Sky Swallower
Simic Sky Swallower.text:
Flying, trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Simic Sky Swallower.flavor:
"We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
—Momir Vig

Embodiment of Spring.name: Embodiment of Spring
Embodiment of Spring.text: {1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Embodiment of Spring: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Embodiment of Spring.flavor: Arel dreamed of winter's end. The next morning she followed a strange trail and found a seedling in the snow.

Icy Blast.name: Icy Blast
Icy Blast.text:
Tap X target creatures.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
Icy Blast.flavor: "Do not think the sand or the sun will hold back the breath of winter."

Longshot Squad.name: Longshot Squad
Longshot Squad.text:
Outlast {1}{G} ({1}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has reach. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

Snowhorn Rider.name: Snowhorn Rider
Snowhorn Rider.text:
Trample
Morph {2}{G}{U}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Snowhorn Rider.flavor: Sure-footed, strong-willed, and ill-tempered—and so is the ram.

Temur Ascendancy.name: Temur Ascendancy
Temur Ascendancy.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

Temur Charm.name: Temur Charm
Temur Charm.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

Rugged Highlands.name: Rugged Highlands
Rugged Highlands.text:
Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rugged Highlands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

Thornwood Falls.name: Thornwood Falls
Thornwood Falls.text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

Hungering Yeti.name: Hungering Yeti
Hungering Yeti.text: As long as you control a green or blue permanent, you may cast Hungering Yeti as though it had flash. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Hungering Yeti.flavor: No clan is as adept at saying "go away" as the Temur.

Mob Rule.name: Mob Rule
Mob Rule.text:
Choose one —
• Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.
• Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

Shaman of the Great Hunt.name: Shaman of the Great Hunt
Shaman of the Great Hunt.text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Ferocious — {2}{G/U}{G/U}: Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

Temur Battle Rage.name: Temur Battle Rage
Temur Battle Rage.text:
Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

Frontier Siege.name: Frontier Siege
Frontier Siege.text:
As Frontier Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of each of your main phases, add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Temur Runemark.name: Temur Runemark
Temur Runemark.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature has trample as long as you control a blue or red permanent.

Whisperer of the Wilds.name: Whisperer of the Wilds
Whisperer of the Wilds.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Ferocious — {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Whisperer of the Wilds.flavor: She speaks only in whispers but can be heard over the fiercest storm.

Yasova Dragonclaw.name: Yasova Dragonclaw
Yasova Dragonclaw.text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}{U/R}{U/R}. If you do, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than Yasova Dragonclaw's power until end of turn, untap that creature, and it gains haste until end of turn.

Swiftwater Cliffs.name: Swiftwater Cliffs
Swiftwater Cliffs.text:
Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield tapped.
When Swiftwater Cliffs enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

Avatar of the Resolute.name: Avatar of the Resolute
Avatar of the Resolute.text:
Reach, trample
Avatar of the Resolute enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Avatar of the Resolute.flavor: It exemplifies the ideals of the Dromoka: strength, unity, and honor.

Collected Company.name: Collected Company
Collected Company.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Collected Company.flavor: Many can stand where one would fall.

Inspiring Call.name: Inspiring Call
Inspiring Call.text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

Stampeding Elk Herd.name: Stampeding Elk Herd
Stampeding Elk Herd.text: Formidable — Whenever Stampeding Elk Herd attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
Stampeding Elk Herd.flavor: The Atarka use them not just for food, but also to clear away snow, trees, and enemy forces.

Dragonlord Atarka.name: Dragonlord Atarka
Dragonlord Atarka.text:
Flying, trample
When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.
